section.class: section section-padded hidden-xs hidden-sm visible-md visible-lg visible-xl

div.h1: Welcome to the Premont Independent School District website!
div.h4: Premont ISD staff, our students, and their families share one common quality: We love our Premont ISD! The citizens, students, and future students of this small South Texas community are proud of their public schools and take great pride in continuing the rich tradition of excellence in education.

div.p:
Follow the link to see what events are scheduled for the school year. Calender events include campus and district events as well as extracurricular events.
More Info

Premont ISD will continue its policy to operate the Community Eligibility Program (CEP) under the National School Lunch Program and School Breakfast Program for the 2017-2018 school year. Schools qualifying to operate CEP serve breakfast and lunch to all children at no charge.
More Info

TxConnect Parent Portal is a unique, web-based tool that allows you to securely view your child’s grades and attendance online.
More Info

div.class: row visible-xs visible-sm hidden-md hidden-lg hidden-xl

div.p: Follow the link to see what events are scheduled for the school year. Calender events include campus and district events as well as extracurricular events.

Premont ISD will continue its policy to operate the Community Eligibility Program (CEP) under the National School Lunch Program and School Breakfast Program for the 2017-2018 school year. Schools qualifying to operate CEP serve breakfast and lunch to all children at no charge.
TxConnect Parent Portal is a unique, web-based tool that allows you to securely view your child’s grades and attendance online.

div.h2: Proud Partner with Texas A&M Kingsville

hr.p: Premont ISD is proud of its partnership with Texas A&M Kingsville.

div.h4: Message from Premont ISD Posted Date: 03/23/2020

div.p: Welcome to our online page for distance learning. Teachers have created and posted online lessons and links. Click on your student’s grade level. https://sites.google.com/premontisd.com/pi[...] . . .

div.h4: Message from Supt. Steve VanMatre Posted Date: 03/12/2020

div.p: Thursday morning the Premont ISD admin team will meet to discuss the Coronavirus and implications to the district including but not limited to: possible action by the Governor and Commission[...] . . .

div.class: custom_71612 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated 0
div.p: The Premont Independent School District is a public school district based in the city of Premont, Texas. The district serves students in the city of Premont and rural areas in southern Jim Wells and southeastern Duval counties. The district was founded in 1921.

439 SW 4th St, Premont, TX 78375
Phone: (361) 348-3915
Fax:

p.em: The Premont I.S.D. and its Career and Technology Education Program do not discriminate on the basis of sex, disability, race, color, or national origin in its educational programs, activities, or employment as required by Title IX, Section 504 and Title VI.

div.p: In order to develop successful individual potential Premont Independent School District will create a culture that promotes risk taking in an environment that values diverse thinking and provides numerous opportunities for successful application of learning by all members of the organization.
